Security Lead

Company: Tata Consultancy Services
Location: Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, India
LinkedIn post

TCS Hiring for Regional Security Lead Position


Role - Regional Security Lead (RSL)

Required Technical Skill Set - Any graduate / Post Graduate

Desired Experience Range - 8- 10 years

Location -Patna /Guwahati /Kolkata /Hamirpur/Vijayawada/Kurnool /Jabalpur / Warangal

Desired Competencies (Technical/Behavioral Competency)



Must-Have**


  • Good understanding & knowledge in activities/processes related to Security (Physical & digital).
  • Experienced in managing Security Team.
  • Experienced in handling stressful situations.
  • Working knowledge of handling security deployments at events or malls.
  • Knowledge of purchase order and invoice payment processing.
  • Working knowledge of security system such as CCTV and access control.
  • Experienced in vendor management.
  • Communicates well and has excellent written and verbal skills.
  • Mastery on MIS (MS Excel, word, and Power Point).
  • Open to travel within the state
  • Experience of functioning in a cross functional environment.
  • Open to take complete ownership, responsibility & accountability of assigned work.
  • Knowledge of Security SLAs, State Statutory Norms and Escalation Handling




Good To Have:


Professional Certifications in Physical security domain, Team Management Skills, Strong analytical and logical understanding, Language skills (Hindi, English, local language)



Thanks & Regards,


Sudha

HR - Talent Acquisition Group

Tata Consultancy Services
